title: Agenda
preamble: Not a system component. Just a todo list culled from @todos in the code.

todos.description: Extra doc (tutorial) - where to start, masterpage and any other previous doc, v4 api?, see tempDoc

New Link component that updates browser history w/ new params

		"import Document, { Head, Main, NextScript } from 'next/document';"

Get jbaker ribbon permission from database - in user service
Refactor into module instead of class
Set mosManager as a role in cloud
Get showe and shudson ribbon permission from database - in user service
Get jbaker ribbon permission from database - in user service

components.name: App
components.description: Connect Next.js to Redux. Create state store. Get data from index page component and send to state store via reducers. Used by Next.js in transpilation; overrides default Next.js _app.

components.name: Document
components.description:
Collect and handle styles from styled-components. Render <html>.

Used by Next.js in transpilation; overrides default Next.js _document.

components.name: Index
components.description:
Fetch data and send it to _app. Render Container component.

Used by Next.js whenever /index is requested.

params.name: s
params.description: URL param indicating which screen is requested.

params.name: p
params.description: URL param indicating which partial screen is requested.

params.name: u
params.description:
URL param indicating current user's account name. 
E.g., "sp1". SPO sets correct current user, even if the wrong user was entered.

params.name: o
params.description:
URL param indicating an account name that should be used 
instead of the current user's account name. If the current user does not have 
permission to emulate another user, this param will be ignored.

services.name: App Loader
services.description:
File is loaded by JS script in SharePoint Online (SPO) master page (mos.2.1.master).
JS code executes automatically. This is the connection between SPO and this app.

Code either loads the app or arranges things for other SPO areas that use 
the same master page.

This is vanilla ES6; it is not compiled or otherwise manipulated. 
Thus, it is both source and distribution, and lives in /public.

services.name: Screen
services.description:
Returns data about screen breakpoints and contents. Users cannot navigate
to screens or partial screens not listed in ReturnSData > screens.

services.name: State Store - Make Store
services.description: Create Redux state store and connect reducers and middleware (redux-thunk).

services.name: State Store - Reducer
services.description:
Define Redux state store reducer. Due to Next.js limitations, this
is the only reducer.

services.name: State Store - Selectors
services.description: Define state selectors for Reselect package, for performance enhancement.

services.name: Style
services.description: Centralized style computations, variables, specs, and patterns.

services.name: User
services.description: Fetch and return data about user.

components.name: Container
components.description:
App root.

Compute and inject global styles. Determine screen size and 
dispatch to state store. Listen for screen resize events and 
re-dispatch screen size to state store. Render App Grid.

components.name: Grid
components.description: Scaffolding for headers and screen contents.

components.name: Partial Screen Header
components.description: Must document upon completion.

components.name: Screen
components.description: Main content within app. Corresponds to "s" url param. Connected to Redux store.

components.name: Partial Screen - Announcements
components.description: Must document upon completion. Connected to Redux store.

components.name: Partial Screen - Classifieds
components.description: Must document upon completion.

components.name: Partial Screen - Pinned
components.description: Must document upon completion. Connected to Redux store.

components.name: Partial Screen - Today and Recent
components.description: Must document upon completion. Connected to Redux store.

components.name: Partial Screen Registry
components.description:
Registry (exports) of all partial screen components.
Screen component gets its partial screen content from this registry.

components.name: Brand - Hub - Logo + Wordmark - Horizontal
components.description: SVG. Letterforms in Akzidenz Grotesk.

components.name: Brand - Hub - Logo Only
components.description: SVG.

components.name: Icon - Home
components.description: SVG from Microsoft Fabric UI

components.name: Icon - Messages
components.description: SVG from Microsoft Fabric UI

components.name: Icon - On The Hub
components.description: SVG from Microsoft Fabric UI

components.name: Icon - People
components.description: SVG from Microsoft Fabric UI

components.name: Icon - Search - Pointed Left
components.description: SVG from Microsoft Fabric UI

components.name: Icon - Search - Pointed Right
components.description: SVG from Microsoft Fabric UI

components.name: Primary Nav
components.description: Primary navigation within app.

components.name: Search - Title - Secondary Nav
components.description: Search box, screen title, partial screen tabs (secondary navigation).

title: Ingredients
preamble: Items such as controls that appear across other parts of the app.

components.name: Button
components.description: Button. Connected to Redux store.

params.name: backgroundColor
params.description:
Color of background. Style service param. 
Reminder: may be transparent. E.g., "bold-pink".

params.name: clickHandler
params.description: Function executed when button is clicked. E.g., () => handleClick(...params).

params.name: contentColor
params.description: Color of text and/or icon. Style service param. E.g., "primary-green".

params.name: contentHeightInRem
params.description: Height of button's text and/or icon, measured in rem. E.g., "3".

params.name: elevationLevel
params.description: Elevation level. Style service param. E.g., "4".

params.name: heightInRem
params.description: Height of button, measured in rem. E.g., "5".

params.name: marginInRem
params.description: Margin size, measured in rem, to be applied to all sides of button. E.g., "2".

params.name: text
params.description: Text content of button. E.g., "Button Text".

params.name: textInvisible
params.description:
Indicates that text should be hidden from sight 
(but will remain available to assistive technologies). E.g., "true".

params.name: widthInRem
params.description: Width of button, measured in rem. E.g., "15".

components.name: Icon
components.description: Icon component. Gets icon content from Icon Registry.

params.name: contentColor
params.description: Fill color for SVG. Style service param. E.g., "ux-pink".

params.name: contentHeightInRem
params.description: Height of icon, measured in rem. E.g., "4".

params.name: darkMode
params.description: Whether user prefers dark mode. E.g., true.

params.name: iconContent
params.description: Which SVG should be used. E.g., "Home".

components.name: Icon Registry
components.description:
Registry (exports) of all icon assets. 
Icon component gets its icon content from this registry.

components.name: Link Button
components.description: Facilitates navigation between screens.

components.name: Plane
components.description: Every two-dimensional space within app. Connected to Redux store.
